Elizabeth Patterson (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_Patterson_(actress) 0 Mary Elizabeth Patterson (November 22, 1874 – January 31, 1966) was an American theatre, film, and television character actress who gained popular recognition late in her career playing the elderly neighbor Matilda Trumbull on the television comedy series I Love Lucy. Mary_Elizabeth_Patterson ( November_22_,_1874 – January_31_,_1966 ) was an_American_theatre , film , and television_character_actress who gained popular_recognition late in her_career playing the_elderly_neighbor_Matilda_Trumbull on the_television_comedy_series I Love Lucy .
